pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AOSC OS 是一个由",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://aosc.io","rel":"nofollow","children":"安同开源社区"}]," 开发的半滚动 Linux 发行版，支持多种处理器架构。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"自动替换","children":"自动替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["AOSC OS 内置 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt-gen-list"}]," 工具来切换社区提供的可用镜像源。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"列出可用镜像源，执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-gen-list list-mirrors","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"要启用某一镜像源，执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-gen-list add-mirror <mirror>","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"{mirror}"}]," 替换为所列出的简称。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"要仅启用某一源，执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-gen-list set-mirror <mirror>","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<mirror>"}]," 替换为所列出的简称。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["关于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt-gen-list"}]," 的语义和详细用法，请执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt-gen-list help"}]," 查看帮助。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手动修改","children":"手动修改"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["修改 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debs stable main","codeLanguage":"properties"}]]}]

meta.title: Anthon 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
